Build 20030316

In order to patch my IDE with dev plugin, I exported org.eclipse.jdt.core using 
custom build script (exportplugin) and exited Eclipse. Noticed the following
entry in the .log:

java.lang.NullPointerException
        at 
org.eclipse.ui.externaltools.internal.ant.launchConfigurations.AntProcess.termin
ated(AntProcess.java:123)
        at 
org.eclipse.ui.externaltools.internal.ant.launchConfigurations.AntLaunchDelegate
$1.run(AntLaunchDelegate.java:175)
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:536)

The proposed fix for this would be to check if the DebugPlugin.getDefault 
returned null.
Agree on fix. Adding EG for RC3 approval.

Fixed in AntProcess.
Please verify DarinW.
